methods.doc:
Removes the module part from the expression in the string.

  demodulize('ActiveSupport::Inflector::Inflections') # => "Inflections"
  demodulize('Inflections')                           # => "Inflections"
  demodulize('::Inflections')                         # => "Inflections"
  demodulize('')                                      # => ""

See also #deconstantize.
